column1: Table 2. Most serious commitment offense of state prisoners released in 24 states in 2008
Report title: Recidivism of Prisoners Released in 24 States in 2008: A 10-Year Follow-Up Period (2008–2018)  NCJ 256094
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2008 data collection, 2008–2018
Authors: Leonardo Antenangeli, Ph.D., and Matthew R. Durose, BJS Statisticians
Table 2. Most serious commitment offense of state prisoners released in 24 states in 2008

Note: For prisoners serving time for more than one offense, the most serious offense is the one with the longest sentence length. The number of released prisoners is rounded to the nearest 100. Details may not sum to totals due to rounding.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2008 data collection, 2008–2018.
